title: Delicate Diamond Wave Bangles - Teerpu Gajulu
features: These modern bangles feature a graceful wave design, crafted in lustrous 18K yellow gold. Each bangle is set with a delicate line of brilliant-cut diamonds, adding a touch of sparkle and elegance. The openwork design allows for comfortable wear and a contemporary aesthetic. The gold features a subtle Hyderabadi polish, enhancing its natural warmth.
occasions: These bangles are perfect for daily wear
festive occasions like Sankranti and Ugadi
as well as modern events and parties. They can be effortlessly styled with both traditional Indian attire and contemporary outfits.
description: These exquisitely designed bangles offer a modern interpretation of traditional Indian jewelry. The delicate diamond setting and graceful wave design make them a unique and versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Their comfortable fit and durable construction ensure they will be treasured for years to come. Made with high-quality 18K gold and brilliant-cut diamonds.
